query:
SELECT ta.id as "attempt_id!: Uuid", ta.container_ref, r.path as "path!"
            FROM task_attempts ta
            JOIN tasks t ON ta.task_id = t.id
            JOIN project_repos pr ON pr.project_id = t.project_id
            JOIN repos r ON r.id = pr.repo_id
            WHERE ta.task_id = $1
            GROUP BY ta.id
